subcommands.name: postcount
subcommands.description: Gather message counts from specified channels and create a report

options.description: comma-separated list of channel IDs to process (uses current if omitted)

options.name: cutoff
options.description: Optional cutoff date as YYYY-MM-DD or relative; default 2 months
